Quest_Name: The Con Woman at the Fountain

MemoryInfobox.name: The Con Woman at the Fountain
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The fountains, a place where women mixed and talked, were the site of a Thief|theft. A thief distracted the other women while they were robbed.'

General_Description: '''The Con Woman at the Fountain''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A woman who had been [[Thief|robbed]] asked Kassandra to deliver retribution.
Section_Dialogue:
Kasssandra approached the woman.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Need something?''
*'''Woman:''' ''At the fountains, another woman offered to help me with my amphora since I also had a heavy basket. She was very chatty. I didn't know her, but it was nice to talk and have help.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So what happened?''
*'''Woman:''' ''While I was talking to her, someone helped themselves to my purchases. Then she left quickly after I discovered this theft. I think she set me up to be robbed!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to kill her?''
*'''Woman:''' ''Yes. Her death is the only solution.''
(Accept – I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You truly are sent by the gods.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Leave it to me.''
Kassandra located the guilty woman and killed her.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Glad that's over with. Now to get paid.''
Kassandra returned to the woman.
*'''Woman:''' ''You. Have you killed her?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''She's no longer your concern.''
*'''Woman:''' ''I'm glad I put my faith in you, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. Please take this.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All in a day's work.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra tracked and killed the thief who had robbed a woman.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
